name: I Don't Know What I'm Doing (VGWhoDev)
name_original: I Don't Know What I'm Doing (VGWhoDev)
description:
A shitty little sandbox. Testing out player abilities.

Controls:

ARROWS = Move player
Z = Shoot
X = Jump
C = Sword
A = Grappling Hook
DOWN + C IN AIR = Downward strike

F4 = Full Screen Toggle
R = Restart, if you get stuck.

You can aim the gun, sword, and hook upwards at any time.
You can't jump off the ladder, you have to climb all the way down to get off.
Don't use the hook off the later or you get stuck.

Guys I'm trying.
